law.catch_line: Unless otherwise authorized under this title, a person may not possess, sell, or attempt to sell uns...

text.section: Unless otherwise authorized under this title, a person may not possess, sell, or attempt to sell unstamped cigarettes in the State.
A person may not make, cause to be made, or procure an altered or counterfeited tax stamp.
A person may not knowingly or willfully use, transfer, or possess an altered or counterfeited tax stamp.
